text:
Due to scheduled maintenance of the Wikimedia Labs infrastructure this tool might suffer temporary outages/instability until the maintenance has finished. Sorry for the inconvenience.
For details please check [Labs-l] Wikitech.wikimedia.org read-only, possible outage, 2015-02-10 1:00GMT.
text_: Due to unscheduled maintenance of the Wikimedia Labs infrastructure this tool might suffer temporary outages/instability until the maintenance has finished. Sorry for the inconvenience.
text__:
Due to unscheduled maintenance of the Wikimedia Labs infrastructure this tool might suffer temporary outages/instability until the maintenance has finished. Sorry for the inconvenience.
For details please check [Labs-l] Rolling reboots today, [Labs-l] Rolling reboots today (finished) and [Labs-l] NFS outage coming up (canceled).
